    • hailTheKing

      public List<String> hailTheKing(int bad, int happy)
      Calculates the prisoners released by the king.
      Parameters:
      bad - - any multiple of bad will be remained in the prison
      happy - - amount of prisoners which will be released
      Returns:
      all the prisoners names which will be released

    • removePersonIfNecessary

      private void removePersonIfNecessary(int prisoner, int bad, List<String> freedPersons, String person)
      Check if prisoner is multiple of bad -> if yes - prisoner will not be released.
      Parameters:
      prisoner - - prisoner number
      bad - - value
      freedPersons - - list of possible freed persons
      person - - name of person
